results.title: Simvastatin does not alleviate muscle pathology in a mouse model of Duchenne muscular dystrophy
results.text_hl: In conclusion, our study revealed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ does not ameliorate @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@DMD@@@ pathology.

results.title: Simvastatin and Muscle: Zebrafish and Chicken Show that the Benefits are not Worth the Damage
results.text_hl: Here, we review and discuss these observations considering reported data on the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ as a potential therapy for @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@Duchenne muscular dystrophy@@@.

results.title: Cholesterol metabolism is a potential therapeutic target in Duchenne muscular dystrophy
results.text_hl: A recent paper reported a positive effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@dystrophic@@@ parameters and muscle function in the mdx @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@.

results.title: A new therapeutic effect of simvastatin revealed by functional improvement in muscular dystrophy.
results.journal: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ dramatically reduced damage and enhanced @DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle@@@ function in @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@dystrophic@@@ (mdx) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Whitehead NP, Kim MJ, Bible KL, Adams ME, Froehner SC. A new therapeutic effect of simvastatin revealed by functional improvement in muscular dystrophy. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2015 Oct 13;112(41):12864-9. PMID: 26417069

results.title: Simvastatin provides long-term improvement of left ventricular function and prevents cardiac fibrosis in muscular dystrophy
results.text_hl: This finding suggests that enhanced parasympathetic function is likely responsible for the improved HRV mediated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. Together, these findings indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ markedly improves cardiac health and function in @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@dystrophic@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, and therefore may provide a novel approach for treating @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathies @DISEASE_MESH:D009202 @@@cardiomyopathy@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@DMD@@@.

citations.NLM: Kim MJ, Bible KL, Regnier M, Adams ME, Froehner SC, Whitehead NP. Simvastatin provides long-term improvement of left ventricular function and prevents cardiac fibrosis in muscular dystrophy Physiol Rep. 2019 Mar;7(6):e14018. PMID: 30912308

results.title: Can low doses of simvastatin enhance fracture healing? An experimental study in rabbits.
results.text_hl: In animals received @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ of 30 mg/kg/day a significant @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@reduction of BMD@@@, stiffness, and energy absorbed to failure were observed.

results.title: Evidence for metabolic aberrations in asymptomatic persons with type 2 diabetes after initiation of simvastatin therapy.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on muscle gene sets showed some similarities to previously described changes that occur in @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@Duchenne muscular dystrophy@@@, @DISEASE_Polymyositis @DISEASE_MESH:D017285 @@@polymyositis@@@, and @DISEASE_Dermatomyositis @DISEASE_MESH:D003882 @@@dermatomyositis@@@.
